__e: He will retake it, and in the act end our suffering...
I could be in your place, and you in mine.
His legions are gathering in the north. We shall take this city, and see all those who have done this to you suffer.
- There are other guys who can take your place over there.
You know, I have an idea to take the hotel.
- What, you don't think we could take it?
